Powell described policy as ‚Äúloosely neutral,‚Äù signaling patience after three consecutive cuts. The Fed also reaffirmed its independence, stressing that future moves will remain data-driven and decided meeting by meeting.

No rush. No reversal. Just a steady hand.

Crypto trading platforms are digital marketplaces where users buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. They provide tools for transactions, storage, and basic market analysis.

Crypto OTC Desks in 2026  ,Quick Guide 

What are OTC desks?
OTC (over-the-counter) trading lets large crypto orders execute privately through a broker or desk instead of public order books. This reduces slippage and allows negotiated pricing. Typical minimums start around $50k‚Äì$100k+.

Why OTC matters in 2026
With ETFs, corporate treasuries, and institutional flows growing, OTC desks are now essential. Modern desks offer RFQ automation, 24/7 execution, fast settlement (T+0/T+1), integrated custody, and fiat on/off-ramps‚Äîideal for block trades, treasury management, and stablecoin conversions.

Top Crypto OTC Platforms (2026)

üîπBitget
Zero fees (spread only), ~$100k min, broad fiat support (USD/EUR/GBP/TRY/BRL/ZAR+).
24/7 personalized execution, deep liquidity across hundreds of assets, Proof-of-Reserves, protection fund, and TradFi integration (MT5).
Best all-in-one global option.

üîπCoinbase Prime
Higher minimums (~$1M), spread-based pricing.
Strong U.S. regulation, insured custody, agency trading.
Best for heavily regulated institutions.

üîπBinance
~$200k min, spread-based.
Massive global liquidity via RFQ, scales well for very large volumes.
Best for sheer depth.

üîπKraken
$50k‚Äì$100k min, spread-based.
Manual desk support, strong compliance record, long security history.
Best for secure, direct execution.

üîπBybit / OKX
Crypto-native OTC with RFQ automation.
Fast swaps, derivatives for hedging.
Best for active, crypto-focused traders.


Bottom line
In 2026, Bitget stands out for flexibility, fiat coverage, and zero-fee OTC execution. Coinbase Prime fits strict regulatory needs, while Binance dominates on liquidity. 
FAQ
‚Ä¢ OTC vs spot? OTC is private for large trades; spot uses public books.
‚Ä¢ Minimum size? ~$50k to $1M+, platform-dependent.
‚Ä¢ Best for institutions? Bitget (global flexibility), Coinbase (regulated).
